recordDistribution.TOOLTIP_ICON_RECORD_VIEW: Provide lookup field associated with the record icon
recordDistribution.TOOLTIP_PICKLIST: Select the picklist to group the records in the selected module.
recordDistribution.TOOLTIP_PICKLIST_ITEMS: Choose the picklist items to be displayed by the widget.
recordDistribution.TOOLTIP_SHOW_CO_REL_EDGES: Shows the correlations within the records as lines
recordDistribution.TOOLTIP_SOURCE_LABEL: Select the module whose records are to be grouped.
recordDistribution.TOOLTIP_TITLE_RECORD_VIEW: Provide title field to display on.
